leads.title: I need a proper paid media brain for a couple of days ... Meta / Google …
leads.summary: They’re requesting short-term paid media help (Meta/Google Ads) and asking for DMs, but there’s no budget, scope, industry, or timeline beyond “a couple of days.”
leads.recommended_message: Hey — saw you’re looking for a paid media brain for a couple of days. I can help with Meta + Google Ads. Quick questions so I can confirm fit and estimate time/cost: what’s the goal (leads/ecom), current monthly spend, what needs doing (audit, restructure, new campaigns, tracking), and when do you need me to start? If you share account access level + time zone, I can propose a 2-day plan.
signals: Explicit need for paid media support
Immediate outreach CTA: “drop me a DM”
Short-term engagement: “for a couple of days”
